title: D4 Mid laner LFT
body:
Looking to join a serious team to compete with. Been playing LoL for about 5 years (Since wukong release). Willing to put time and effort into practicing and competing. I use Skype/TS for communication. Hit me up if interested.

IGN: PookaBed
Skype: luke.is.the.zaz.

replies.body: Probably not the best idea to include your skype, you might get ddosed. Just a tip!
